summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to City employment, to be known as the Fourth Quarter 2006 Salary Ordinance; authorizing the execution of a Memorandum of Agreement by and between the City of Seattle and the International Federation of Professional and Technical Engineers, Local 17; establishing new titles and new salaries, some retroactive to 2005; designating positions as exempt from Civil Service status; and amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 4.20.430; all by a 2/3 vote of the City Council.
